name: Museum Heist - Robbery Game
description:
Find your way through each puzzling level to complete the ultimate sticky-fingered heist! Scope out the scene and come up with your plan to steal the goods. Grab the loot and make your escape! Can you escape with the loot without getting caught?

• SCOPE out your target before you make your move
• GRAB the loot when no one is watching
• ESCAPE without tripping the alarm or getting caught by the guards!
• STEAL your way to the top in this new and exciting puzzle game!
